DOC.brief_title: Spiriva Observational Study Measuring Saint George 's Respiratory Questionnaire ( SGRQ ) Routine Medical Practice Central & Eastern European Region
DOC.detailed_description: Study Design : open-label , uncontrolled single arm post-marketing surveillance study
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 40 year old male female ambulatory outpatient . Clinical diagnosis Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease ( COPD ) ( Global Initiative Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease ( GOLD ) Guidelines : Forced expiratory Volume one second ( FEV1 ) / Forced Vital Capacity ( FVC ) < 0.7 FEV1 < 80 % predict ) . Stable patient , without exacerbation least one month study . Exclusion criterion : Uncooperative patient judge physician . Patients condition , accord participate physician 's opinion , might decrease chance obtain satisfactory data achieve objective observation study .
